column1: 1594243980279287808,1594243980279287808@McKenzieBurkha4 @LGBwiththeT @DeborahMeaden What about women who commit assualt in these spaces? How will you deal with that? Will you have some kind of psych evaluation before admission? Its preposterous. Trans women are no more a threat than anyone else, they are being villified and bullied - this is fascism. t_end
